summary: A skyre patcher for reaperix's Elemental Destruction Magic
descriptionHtml:
This is a [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286/?]SkyRe[/url] patch for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/69474/?]reaperix's Elemental Destruction Magic[/url]. This mod makes the perk to be compatible with SkyRe perks.

[b][color=#00ffff]WHAT'S THE DIFFERENCES?[/color]
[/b]The original elemental destruction perk are monotone and cause conflict if it's used along with SkyRe, especially at destruction and enchanting perk.

I removed the enchanting perk from the original mod completely since the SkyRe perk had been covers all the wind, earth, and water in one perk (Elemental Enchanter)

[b][color=#ff7700]Destruction perks:[/color]
[b]Augmented Earth (3 ranks)[/b] - Earth spells do <20%-60%> more damage.
[b]Augmented Water[/b] [/b][b][b](3 ranks)[/b][/b][b] - Water spells do [b]<20%-60%>[/b] more damage.
[b]Augmented Wind[/b] [/b][b][b](3 ranks)[/b][/b][b] - Wind spells do [/b][b]<20%-60%>[/b][b] more damage.
[b]Armor Crusher (3 ranks) [/b]- Earth damage makes targets much more vulnerable to physical damage if health at <depend on rank>
[b]Dry Drown[/b][/b][b][b] (3 ranks) [/b][/b][b]- Water damage will cause targets to start drowning if their health[/b][b] at <depend on rank>[/b][b]
[b]Gale Force[/b][/b][b][b] (3 ranks) [/b][/b][b]- Wind damage will always blow targets away if their health[/b][b] at <depend on rank>[/b]

[color=#00ffff][b]INSTALLATION
[/b][/color]Place this mod below [i]SkyRe_Main.esp[/i] and [i]Elemental Destruction.esp[/i]

[b][color=#00ffff]COMPABILITY[/color]
[/b]As long as you don't use mod that changes destruction and enchanting perk (other than SkyRe itself), it will be okay



Sekian dan terima kasih~ ^_^

[i]saipoon[/i]
author: saipoon
